channel.title: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

image.title: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

item.title: Coinbase Seeks to Take Core Question in U.S. SEC Case to Higher Court
item.dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
item.description: Coinbase is seeking to rip the bandage off of a legal impasse at the center of the crypto industry's fight with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), filing an interim appeal on Friday that would ask a higher federal court to drill into the heart of the regulator's stance on digital assets, even as the broader SEC case proceeds through the judicial system.

media:content.media:description: CEO Brian Armstrong's Coinbase is appealing a key point in its court dispute with Chair Gary Gensler's Securities and Exchange Commission. (CoinDesk)

item.title: Bitcoin Plunges to $66K, Altcoins Tumble 10-15% on Ugly Day for Risk Assets
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Investors may expect market weakness due to the tax season, Ryze Labs said in a report.

item.title: Why Bitcoin Halving Calculators Are Out of Sync
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kuhn
item.description: The famously pre-planned, programmatic event, currently predicted for April 19, is surprisingly hard to predict at minute scales.

item.title: Avail, Blockchain Data Availability Project, Sketches Out Eligibility for Token Airdrop
item.dc:creator: Margaux Nijkerk
item.description: A screenshot of a document describing the eligibility criteria for the airdrop was posted on the social-media platform X by the user @Bitcoineo, and Avail’s public-relations team flagged the to tweet to CoinDesk, describing it as a "leak."

media:content.media:description: Avail co-founders Anurag Arjun and Prabal Banarjee (Avail)

item.title: Dogecoin Climbs 5.4%, Tops CoinDesk 20 This Week: CoinDesk Indices Market Update
item.dc:creator: Tracy Stephens

item.title: Hacker Sentenced to 3 Years in Prison for Stealing Over $12M From Crypto Exchanges
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: Shakeeb Ahmed, a security engineer who stole over $12 million from two different decentralized cryptocurrency exchanges built on Solana, was sentenced to three years in prison and three years of supervised release by a federal judge on Friday.

item.title: The Halving Highlights Why Bitcoin Needs to Upgrade
item.dc:creator: Bob Bodily
item.description: Higher fees from Ordinals and BRC-20 may be good for miners but they risk pushing activity to the fragmented world of L2s and harming adoption of Bitcoin around the world. Proposals for “OP_CAT” and CTV would upgrade the network and allow more innovation at the chain-level, says Bob Bodily, CEO of Bioniq, an Ordinals marketplace.

item.title: How to Get Funded in Crypto
item.dc:creator: Azeem Khan

item.title: Asset Tokenization Draws Focus From Global Securities Watchdogs
item.dc:creator: Camomile Shumba
item.description: The International Organization of Securities Commissions wants to analyse whether or not further policy direction is needed for tokenization.

item.title: First Mover Americas: BTC Holds Stable at $70K
item.dc:creator: Lyllah Ledesma, Omkar Godbole
item.description: The latest price moves in bitcoin (BTC) and crypto markets in context for April 12, 2024. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.

item.title: Hong Kong Could Approve Spot Bitcoin, Ether ETFs as Early as Monday: Bloomberg
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: Hong Kong could approve approve spot bitcoin (BTC) and ether (ETH) exchange-traded funds as early as Monday, Bloomberg said, citing two people familiar with the matter.
item.media:keywords: Hong Kong, Spot bitcoin etf, spot ether etf, BTC, eth

item.title: Australian Court Hands Over $41 Million of Crypto Held by Blockchain Mining Group at Regulator's Request
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: An Australian federal court agreed to a petition by markets regulator ASIC to hand over some US$41 million in digital assets invested by over 450 Australians with the mining companies to specialists from advisory and restructuring company McGrathNicol.
item.media:keywords: Restructuring, Blockchain Mining, NGS, Australia, Crypto, Digital Assets, ASIC, Market Regulator

item.title: Bitcoin Cash Sends Bitcoin Traders Warning Sign About Halving
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: Bitcoin cash has been seen a proxy for the upcoming halving of rewards on the Bitcoin blockchain.

item.title: TON Foundation Teams Up With HashKey to Drive Crypto On-Ramping in Telegram
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: HashKey and the Foundation are focussing their partnership on Hong Kong in the first phase.

item.title: Bitcoin Meme Coin PUPS Fuelled by Hype Ahead of Runes Release
item.dc:creator: Shaurya Malwa
item.description: Ordinals and Runes are both projects by long-time Bitcoin developer Casey Rodarmor, which has created trust and lent an idea of authenticity among users.

media:content.media:description: 16:9 Bitcoin PUPS. (X post by Multibit/Bitcoin Pups)

item.title: Ether.Fi Inks $500M Restaking Deal With RedStone Oracles
item.dc:creator: Margaux Nijkerk
item.description: Under its deal with RedStone, Ether.Fi will dedicate $500 million to help secure RedStone's data oracles, which are used to pass information between blockchains and the outside world.

media:content.media:description: Ether.Fi CEO Mike Silagadze (CoinDesk, modified using PhotoMosh)

item.title: Hong Kong-Listed Bitcoin ETFs Could Unlock Up to $25B in Demand, Crypto Firm Says
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: Singapore-based Matrixport expects mainland Chinese investors to move billions into potential Hong Kong-listed spot BTC ETFs through the Stock Connect program.

item.title: Bitcoin Stable Near $71K as GBTC Outflows Pick Back Up
item.dc:creator: Sam Reynolds
item.description: The Thursday total ETF flow was negative, with GBTC leading the pack

item.title: Ethena Labs Divides Opinion as High Yield Stirs Memories of Terra
item.dc:creator: Oliver Knight
item.description: "A lot of things can go wrong," in Ethena's yield-generation strategy, said Folkvang CEO Mike van Rossum.

media:content.media:description: Ethena's total value locked surged 12-fold in 60 days. (DefiLlama)

item.title: Top U.S. House Lawmakers Meet on Stablecoin Bill Strategy: Punchbowl
item.dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
item.description: The U.S. congressional effort to establish regulations for stablecoins has become an increasing longshot for passage this year, but the lawmakers who've pushed legislation the farthest reportedly had a meeting with Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer about it, Punchbowl News reported.

media:content.media:description: Key U.S. lawmakers met Thursday to talk about how to advance stablecoin legislation. (Jesse Hamilton/CoinDesk)

item.title: Ondo Spikes 8% as Ondo Finance Tests Instant Conversion From BlackRock's Tokenized Fund to USDC
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Stablecoin issuer Circle introduced a new smart contract function earlier Thursday to allow near-instant, around-the-clock redemptions from BlackRock's BUIDL fund for USDC stablecoins.
item.media:keywords: ondo price, blackrock buidl, blackrock tokenized fund

item.title: Thai Crypto Exchange Bitkub May Be Valued as High as $3B in IPO: CEO
item.dc:creator: Sheldon Reback
item.description: Jirayut Srupsrisopa said earlier this month that an IPO was planned for next year.

item.title: Aptos Falls 16% Over Past Week, Lagging Ahead of $300M Token Unlocking Event
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Nearly 25 million of locked-up APT tokens will be released Friday including to early investors, TokenUnlocks data shows.
item.media:keywords: aptos, aptos price, aptos token unlock

media:content.media:description: Aptos price through the week to April 11 (CoinDesk)

item.title: Willem Schroé: Building Botanix, a Bitcoin Layer 2 That Brings the EVM to Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Frank Corva
item.description: A Belgian polymath and his team are building a “spiderchain” network that harnesses both bitcoin’s sound money properties and Ethereum’s technological capabilities.

item.title: Avi Eisenberg May Testify in $110M Crypto Fraud Trial, Defense Says
item.dc:creator: Danny Nelson
item.description: The crypto trader is facing up to 20 years in jail if convicted on all counts.

media:content.media:description: Avi Eisenberg is accused of fraudulent trading on Mango Markets ((Deon Black, Unsplash)

item.title: The SEC’s Suit Against Uniswap Is an Opening Attack Against DeFi
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kuhn
item.description: The DEX received a Wells Notice from the regulator, suggesting an enforcement action is imminent. While we don’t know the nature of the potential charges, the news raises the threat of legal jeopardy for decentralized finance.

item.title: Craig Wright Drops Appeal Against Hodlonaut in Norway
item.dc:creator: Cheyenne Ligon
item.description: Wright’s decision to drop his appeal comes a month after a U.K. court ruled that he was not Satoshi Nakamoto.

media:content.media:description: Still from Craig Wright's testimony on day three of the Hodlonaut vs. Craig Wright trial on Sept. 14, 2022. (Bitcoin Magazine/YouTube)

item.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Appeals Fraud Conviction
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De, Cheyenne Ligon
item.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried filed to appeal his conviction and sentence for fraud and conspiracy charges on Thursday, hours before his deadline to do so.

item.title: Ethereum's Next Upgrade, 'Pectra,' Could Include Relief for Institutional Stakers, Wallet UX Improvements
item.dc:creator: Margaux Nijkerk
item.description: Developers' aim with Pectra is to make some minor code changes while simultaneously working on a bigger code change, Verkle trees, for the following upgrade.

item.title: Chaos at MarginFi Shakes up Solana DeFi's Borrow-and-Lend Landscape
item.dc:creator: Danny Nelson
item.description: Solend and Kamino were the biggest winners in the Solana DeFi landscape.

item.title: Pepe Coin Spikes on Coinbase International Plan to List Perpetual Futures
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The crypto exchange's off-shore arm will open perpetuals market for the popular meme coin on April 18.

item.title: 'Bitcoin Sign Guy' Is Auctioning His Bitcoin Sign
item.dc:creator: Marc Hochstein
item.description: Christian Langalis, whose 2017 photo-bombing of Janet Yellen became a viral meme, will use the proceeds to fund his Bitcoin/Lightning/Urbit startup.

media:content.media:description: Christian Langlais (left, wearing seersucker) in July 2017. (C-Span)

item.title: Chainlink Aims to Make Transfers Across Blockchains Safer with New Bridge App 'Transporter'
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The bridge leverages Chainlink's CCIP tech, and allows users to transfer crypto assets across multiple blockchains, starting with Arbitrum, Avalanche, Base, BNB Chain, Ethereum, Optimism, Polygon, and WEMIX.

media:content.media:description: Chainlink co-founder Sergey Nazarov speaks at the project's SmartCon conference this week in Barcelona. (Chainlink)

item.title: Crypto for Advisors: Are ETH ETFs Coming?
item.dc:creator: Sarah Morton, David Lawant
item.description: Market odds of approval in May are dwindling, but David Lawant and Purvi Maniar of FalconX say we’ll likely see an ETH ETF approval over the next 12-18 months.

item.title: Ether Spot ETFs Still Have No More Than 50% Chance of Approval in May: JPMorgan
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: There will probably be litigation against the SEC after May if ether ETFs aren’t approved, the report said.

item.description: Bitcoin is stable as Asia begins its trading day, but crypto quant shop sees risk assets pricing in two, not three rate cuts.

item.description: "The main problem was our lack of organizational execution," MarginFi's longtime leader Edgar Pavlovsky told CoinDesk.

item.title: Bitcoin Rebounds to $70K, Shrugging Off Hot U.S. Inflation Print
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Major U.S. equity indices closed the day lower as faster CPI reading for March, will BTC was up 1%.

item.title: Former Ethereum Adviser Intends to Sue U.S. Government for $9.6B Over Dropped Extortion Charges
item.dc:creator: Cheyenne Ligon
item.description: The former Ethereum adviser has retained well-known civil liberties lawyer Alan Dershowitz to serve as a consultant on constitutional issues in the case.
